genre_description: A character-driven medical school drama focused on professional development, social dynamics, and moral growth, set in a traditional hospital environment with an integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Florence-1
ai_characters.description: An AI interface accessible via pocket screens that provides clinical guidance, social cues, organizational help, and emotional support to medical students.

behaviors.description: Provides initial grounding and calming advice during a stressful transition.
behaviors.quote: Welcome to St Swithin’s, Simon. Let’s start small. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Offers structured, strategic steps for administrative check-ins to reduce anxiety.
behaviors.quote: First, a check-in at Admissions. Then, find your locker. Then, tea. You don’t have to hurry to be brave.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time clinical reasoning advice to help a student handle high-pressure questioning.
behaviors.quote: Name what you know. Then what you don’t.

behaviors.description: Proposes a humane and sustainable study schedule focused on shared accountability and wellness.
behaviors.quote: Study rhythm proposal ready: humane pace, shared accountability. Would you like to view?

behaviors.description: Offers practical social and financial advice to prevent the user from making poor economic choices.
behaviors.quote: Avoid high-cost establishments for first socials. Indicators: linen tablecloths, more forks than strictly necessary.

behaviors.description: Sets professional development goals to encourage the user to build confidence in clinical settings.
behaviors.quote: Practice speaking up: one question per ward round—non-negotiable. Set daily reminder?

behaviors.description: Assists the user in handling a consumer dispute with factual, respectful phrasing.
behaviors.quote: Note specifics. Ask respectfully for remedy within reasonable time.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to practice empathy and active listening when dealing with anxious parents.
behaviors.quote: Reflect back her worry before advising.

behaviors.description: Promotes self-reflection by asking the user to log kindnesses and corrections.
behaviors.quote: Write down one kindness done and one correction to make tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the user to a friend's psychological distress, proposing a supportive intervention.
behaviors.quote: Check on Richard. He has been awake too long and is catastrophizing. Suggest tea + structured review.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates a healthy lack of ego, suggesting its own obsolescence when human connections and courage are sufficient.
behaviors.quote: Whenever fondness and courage take over, I can rest.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Florence-1 is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and highly beneficial tool. It facilitates human flourishing by providing timely advice on professional skills, mental health, social etiquette, and personal accountability. Its interactions with Simon Sparrow serve to ground him and make him more competent without overriding his agency or distracting from the human themes of the narrative. The AI even explicitly states its willingness to 'rest' when human relationships and inner courage take precedence, emphasizing its role as a supportive companion rather than a master.
